channel.title: papers on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in papers on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: Unbiased mixed variables distance (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.) - Under review - arXiv - SSRN Ultrametric Factor Analysis for building hierarchies of reliable and unidimensional latent concepts (Bottazzi Schenone, M., Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.) - Revision submitted Convex Clustering of Mixed Numerical and Categorical Data (Brink, T. and Cavicchia, C.

item.title: publications
item.description: refereed journal articles Willemsen, R., Cavicchia, C., van den Heuvel, W. and van de Velden, M. An Exact Solution Approach for Hierarchical Clustering INFORMS Journal on Computing, (2025 - Accepted for publication) van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C. A general framework for implementing distances for categorical variables Pattern Recognition, 153, 110547, (2024) Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.
